if you honestly believe what you think do what i said and post a mediainfo summary of this file.

I D/L'ed This, The Video was great, But that doesnt matter, There is a CLICKING SOUND All The Way Through It, I had to Delete it, The clicking sound really SUCKED Man.. Sorry GlowGaze, A Hit And Miss in that Department, Thx for the effort, Maybe check the Quality before you Upload It, Just an Idea....

xzxero: at the time of this upload and my original comment the movie was still in the coming up section on yifys site. seemed it wasnt uploaded there yet or anywhere i could see. but yes glowgloze does rip off all yify torrents. this is known to all yify fans. just he seemed to beat him on this one
ahh i c just read the uploader notes on yify site. was taken down. my bad. he really did steal this
reason it was taken down to if anyone is wondering is the audio is crackly. i think its unwatchable. still havent watched it. deleted it and got the real one from yify.

Stop bitching about GlowGaze stealing Yify's shit. Do any of you really give a shit from where he gets his shit? Really? Do you get paid/praised/idfc, for talking shit about him stealing Yify's shit? Seriously, it doesn't matter where the fuck he gets it. I think that is a problem for him and Yify to solve, which I don't see a problem with really... I honestly don't give a damn where he gets his movies from, as long as they come fast and are good quality... End rant....

xzxero-4 starters i gaurantee ya i've read a hell of lot more books than u as a matter of fact i average around 3to4 books a week and when it comes down 2 spelling i will spell whatever the hell i want exactly how i want so b4 u call sum1 a moron best 4 u 2 know who the fuck u r talkin 2 "FUCKTARD"I have a HD screen and can clearly c the difference between the 2 if u cant then thats your problem u blind-ass bitch!!!!
This really is horrible and unwatchable because of the audio, please don't waste your time.  The video quality is great but it's unwatchable unless you turn the audio off and use the subtitles only.
